parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma1

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.08

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Roads and Airports

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Sides

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Set owning side of the airport. [[Arma: Airport IDs|ID]] is the number to identify which airport on the island you want to check.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> id [[setAirportSide]] side

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> id: [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> side: [[Side]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> target [[setAirportSide]] side <template><title>Since</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.68</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value>y</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> target: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> side: [[Side]]

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Nothing]]

		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>0 [[setAirportSide]] [[east]]</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[airportSide]], [[landAt]], [[land]], [[assignToAirport]], [[allAirports]], [[Arma: Airport IDs]]
</value></part></template>
